location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from W Hewitson, Lieutenant Comm. the Teignmouth, at Bushire, to Andrew Jukes Esq., Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from W Hewitson, Lieutenant Comm. the Teignmouth, at Bushire, to Andrew Jukes Esq., Acting Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter on the same day, and informing that the Fury, carrying a packet for Brigadier General Malcolm, was not safe against piratical attacks in the Gulf.
